Chachalaca.description: A sweet treat, lots of sugar. Named for a bird native to Brazil
ingredients: equal parts steamed milk and espresso

Pure Focus.description: The sort of drink where one must decide between dead and deadline.
ingredients: As much espresso as you can handle

Spelunker.description: Take a trip on the wild side, goin
ingredients: Fill the cup halfway with coffee

Witches Brew.description: A doubled double, toiled, free of trouble.
ingredients: Six parts Brewed Beane of Coffee
Equal parts Water and Filtered Beane
